headline: ON Semiconductor Balances Stable Credit Outlook With US$6b Buyback Plan
summary: Moody’s revised ON Semiconductor’s (NasdaqGS:ON) credit outlook from positive to stable. The company’s board approved a share repurchase program of up to US$6b. Both actions point to a shift in how the company is balancing its capital structure and shareholder returns. ON Semiconductor, which focuses on power and sensing chips for automotive, industrial and other end markets, is operating through a period where demand signals across key sectors are mixed and inventory trends remain...
